title: Anyone Have a T215 Red Cross Type For Sale?
author: Orioles1954

posts.post_title: Anyone Have a T215 Red Cross Type For Sale?
posts.post_content:
Looking for a T215 Red Cross type. Preferably a common in the SGC 30-40 range.....but will listen to anything.

James

I have a few of them I could part with.  Send my your email address and I can get some scans sent your way.  Thanks much,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
